additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: 782030 7 - Ingredients : Aqua / Water, Glycerin, Peg-100 Stearate, Rosa Gallica Extract / Rosa Gallica Flower Extract, Glyceryl Stearate, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil / Sweet Almond Oil, Ammonium Polyacryldimethyltauramide / Ammonium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Disodium Edta, Isopropyl Palmitate, Capryloyl Salicylic Acid, Citric Acid, Xanthan Gum, Cetyl Alcohol, Tocopherol, Sodium Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol, Myrtrimonium Bromide, Linalool, Geraniol, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Coumarin, Limonene, Hydroxyisohexyl 3-Cyclohexene Carboxaldehyde, Citral, Citronellol, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Parfum / Fragrance. (F.I.L. B164752/2). Please be aware that ingredient lists for the products of our brand are updated regularly. Please refer to the ingredient list on your product package for the most up to date list of ingredients to ensure it is suitable to your personal use., 781001 5 - INGREDIENTS: AQUA / WATER âGLYCERIN âPEG-100 STEARATE âROSA GALLICA EXTRACT / ROSA GALLICA FLOWER EXTRACT âGLYCERYL STEARATE âPRUNUS AMYGDALUS DULCIS OIL / SWEET ALMOND OIL â AMMONIUM POLYACRYLDIMETHYLTAURAMIDE / AMMONIUM POLYACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE âDISODIUM COCOAMPHODIACETATE âDISODIUM EDTA âISOPROPYL PALMITATE â CAPRYLOYL SALICYLIC ACID âCITRIC ACID âXANTHAN GUM âCETYL ALCOHOL âTOCOPHEROL âSODIUM BENZOATE â PHENOXYETHANOL âMYRTRIMONIUM BROMIDE âLINALOOL âGERANIOL âALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE âCOUMARIN â LIMONENE âHYDROXYISOHEXYL 3-CYCLOHEXENE CARBOXALDEHYDE âCITRAL âCITRONELLOL âBUTYLPHENYL METHYLPROPIONAL âBENZYL ALCOHOL âBENZYL SALICYLATE âPARFUM / FRAGRANCE â For any queries related to L'Oreal formulas and ingredients, please contact L'Oreal Australia Consumer Affairs on 1300 659 359
